attributes.action: NO to the Queen receiving a £5m pay rise from taxpayers
attributes.additional_details: In response to the just released figures which states that the sovereign grant funded by the taxpayer has increased from £31m in the financial year of 2012-2013 to £36.1m in the financial year of 2013-2014, this petition  calls on the government to revert such 'pay rises', demonstrating that 'we are all in this together'.
